details:
Colin Percival reports:

> In versions 1.0.22 through 1.0.27 of Tarsnap, the CTR nonce value
> is not incremented after each chunk is encrypted. (The CTR counter
> is correctly incremented after each 16 bytes of data was processed,
> but this counter is reset to zero for each new chunk.)
>
> Note that since the Tarsnap client-server protocol is encrypted,
> being able to intercept Tarsnap client-server traffic does not
> provide an attacker with access to the data.
